price: Deε wͻn mu dodoᴐ no adwen kyerε wͻn no na wͻdi akyire. Nokorε sε, deε wͻn adwen kyerε wͻn no ho mma mfasoͻ biara wͻ Nokorε no ho. Nokorε sε, Onyankopͻn ne dwuma a wͻdie no ho Nimdefoͻ.
arabic: وَمَا يَتَّبِعُ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ إِلَّا ظَنًّاۚ إِنَّ ٱلظَّنَّ لَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّ شَيۡـًٔاۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمُۢ بِمَا يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamā yattabiʿu aktharuhum illā ẓannan inna al-ẓana lā yugh'nī mina al-ḥaqi shayan inna al-laha ʿalīmun bimā yafʿalūna
